originalText.text:
Gf had appt at nail salon, for mani pedi w/ gel nails. Pedi didnâ€™t start until 45 mins after scheduled time, nails werenâ€™t filed. Mani portion should have had nail removal ($10 additional) but nail tech did not want to do removal and convinced her to just get the color changed ($25 additional) instead. Nail tech did not mention that color was hard to work with until after 2 coats were on and they came out transparent and looked poor in the light.

Donâ€™t believe we will be coming here again and it was her regular nail salon.

originalText.text:
I donâ€™t know where to startâ€¦ I tried to give this place an opportunity two times but it seems not to be important to them. The First time I was there, they messed up the color which I was not truly mad about so they didnâ€™t pay good attention to it so I let them get away with it.
My second time there, a guy working there cut my skin off using one of the nail file drill and then pretended nothing happened. On top of that, a day after (just one day after) one of my
nails is damaged. How is that even posible?

originalText.text:
My wife went to this nail salon and had a horrible experience. She came in looking to get a regular polish and they upsold her on a more expensive manicure that ended up costing her 65 before tip.

Since itâ€™s in close vicinity to where we live, she was hoping to give it a try and make it her go-to nail salon. The service itself was okay but once she went to pay for a much more expensive manicure than she originally came in for, they said her tip wasnâ€™t enough and DEMANDED that she pay more, in a time that was heard across the whole salon. If they hadnâ€™t embarrassed my wife, who folded under pressure, they would have gotten a new bi-weekly customer and generated FAR more business instead of the additional 3 dollars they were trying to get out of her (forcing her to break 100 dollar bill).

Clearly this is a theme judging by the other reviews and they donâ€™t seem to care that their poor service is costing them business.

originalText.text: This nail salon is conveniently located people are really nice but poor quality of work and very expensive â€¦.. went 6 times for a powder gel manicure and had to take the time 5 out of the 6 times to have the entire manicure redone!!! Nails chipped right away and liters broke and they insist on doing what they want despite what you tell them what you prefer!!   Do yourself a favor and walk a few blocks down to the fabulous Issa Nailsâ€¦. Fabulous!!
